name: Terror Bird
description: The Terror Bird is a large, fierce beast with a serrated beak, notable for its aggressive charging attacks and combat prowess.
memorable: Known for its Pack Tactics ability, the Terror Bird excels in group combat by gaining advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
goals: Typically engages in hunting and aggressive territorial behavior.
relations: May be found in groups and can work in tandem with other beasts.
environment: Often inhabits open areas where it can sprint and hunt.
strengths: Exceptional strength for powerful physical attacks and advantage on attacks in a pack.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence limits complex strategies and tactics.
attacks: Utilizes its Serrated Beak for melee attacks, inflicting significant slashing damage with potential lingering effects.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics allows the Terror Bird to quickly overwhelm its foes by working together with allies.
senses: Possesses darkvision that allows it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Excels in Athletics and has a decent perception ability.
additional_information: Moves quickly at 50 feet and can deliver strong physical attacks.
Has a relatively good Constitution score, providing decent resilience.
Can inflict additional slashing damage if the initial attack succeeds.
Simple-minded behavior may lead to predictable combat patterns.
test_queries: bird that attacks with Pack Tactics
